item.title: Double Dragon Gaiden: Rise of the Dragons free DLC characters Evil Marian and Super Anubis now available
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Second free character pack of 2025.

Double Dragon Gaiden: Rise of the Dragons free downloadable content characters Evil Marian and Super Anubis are now available, publisher Maximum Entertainment and developer Secret Base announced.

Here is an overview of each character, via Maximum Entertainment:

Evil Marian

Once a trusted ally, Marian is now under the grip of an unknown, malevolent force. Cold and distant, she floats above the ground, lashing out with psychic blasts and violent telekinesis. Her eyes are vacant, her voice devoid of emotion—something ancient has taken hold of her…and it’s not letting go.

Super Anubis

For years, whispers claimed Anubis was a fraud, a cult figure with no true power. But now, Super Anubis has emerged: levitating, glowing, and summoning dark forces beyond comprehension. The question lingers—was he a fake all along…or a prophet finally revealed?

Double Dragon Gaiden: Rise of the Dragons is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam.

item.title: Chip ‘n Clawz vs. The Brainioids launches August 26
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Priced at $29.99.

Chip ‘n Clawz vs. The Brainioids, a new action strategy game that blends third-person action with real-time strategy gameplay, will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on August 26 for $29.99, publisher Arc Games and Phoenix Point developer Snapshot Games announced. At launch, “Friend’s Pass” will be also be available, which will allow you to enjoy online cooperative and competitive multiplayer for free with a friend who owns the game.

Here is an overview of the game, via Arc Games:

About

From the creator of X-COM Jullian Gollop, Chip ‘n Clawz vs. The Brainioids is an action strategy game that seamlessly blends both third-person action and the essence of real-time strategy gameplay for a uniquely fun experience that brings a fresh take on classic strategy games. The alien Brainioids are invading Earth to gather up their vital resource of Brainium and it’s up to Chip and Clawz to protect the planet and repel the invaders! Players can get up close and personal to the action while building bases, gathering resources, commanding minions, and joining the fray of battle in fast matches for even faster-paced action. Set in a bright and exciting universe that transports players into a fresh, throwback comic book style world, Chip ‘n Clawz vs. the Brainioids is a comedic, fun and rewarding heroic adventure for the whole family.

Key Features

  • Fusion of Action and Strategy
    • Play as the heroic duo, Chip and Clawz, in singleplayer or co-op, to put a stop to the Brainioid invasion in an exciting and humorous story campaign with normal and hard difficulty modes.
    • Jump right into the action in fast-paced, pick-up-and-play missions with easy to learn yet satisfying to master game mechanics that bring a modern take to classic strategy games
    • Lead the charge against the Brainioids as you build your arsenal of bases, weapons, and hero abilities. Assemble and command an army of minions and fight beside them in large scale battles.
    • Exhilarating boss battles against the mightiest of Brainioids will put your base and minion management skills to the ultimate test.
  • Multiple Multiplayer Modes
    • Experience multiplayer mayhem in epic army battles with or against your friends!
    • Two-player couch cooperative play to double your fun—coordinate your tactics with a friend to defeat the Brainioid forces.
    • Dive into the player-versus-player mayhem—classic online one-versus-one, two-versus-two, buddy up with a friend or clash in split-screen one-versus-one to see who’s the best of the best.
    • Jump into player-versus-player matches or invite anyone to join your adventure campaign on any platform thanks to cross-platform play support across PC and consoles.
  • Comic Book Style and Story Telling
    • Step into and explore a vibrant and full of fun world with a comic book-like style and flair.
    • Meet a colorful and funny cast of characters each with their own unique stories to tell across your adventures.
    • Explore every nook and cranny of each level to collect rare collectible items and secrets, like comic books that unveil the mysteries of the Brainioid invasion, and find blueprints to build new weapons, minion upgrades and hero abilities.

item.title: Detective VR announced for PS VR2, SteamVR
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS VR2
  • PS5

Due out in spring 2026.

VRKiwi will release virtual reality murder mystery adventure game Detective VR for PlayStation VR2 and SteamVR in spring 2026, the developer announced.

Detective VR first launched for Quest 3 on February 27.

Here is an overview of the game, via VRKiwi:

About

Step into a thrilling narrative investigation in virtual reality! In Detective VR, you control time, collect crucial clues, and interview witnesses to unravel the plot.

Explore unreliable testimonies and confront suspects to uncover the truth. You’ll feel like a true crime scene investigator, taking photos, linking clues, and switching environments to find new evidence. The pressure is on as you are at the center of the investigation, observing everything to solve the crime. Each suspect offers their own “truth,” and you must carefully evaluate their testimonials. Time Control provides an immersive way to explore the story through character replays, allowing you to rewind, pause, and play scenes to discover hidden clues in the timeline and expose who speaks the truth.

Detective VR is designed for an immersive experience on Steam VR, offering innovative storytelling in Virtual Reality. Imagine a blend of the captivating investigations of Obra Dinn and the intricate narrative of Immortality, with the cutting-edge interface of Minority Report.

Key Features

  • Five hours of gripping story-driven gameplay,
  • One compelling story with six unique characters and 11 sequences to explore,
  • Motion Captured performance: six incredible actors who bring the characters to life. You may have seen them in series such as The Crown, Succession, and Doctor Who.
  • Time Control: Rewind, pause, and play scenes to find hidden clues in the timeline.
  • Full hand tracking support (for the best immersive experience, we recommend playing this way).
